nodes.text: Sanrafsix was an Outer Rim Territories astronomical object situated in the grid square N-17 of the Standard Galactic Grid It was connected by hyperspace routes to the celestial bodies Darkknell and Omwat as well as the Mid Rim astronomical object Enarc.

Sanrafsix was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the January 29, 2016 StarWars.com article "Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?" by Mark Newbold. The world Sanrafsix was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
